The Korean: language caption accompanying the video claims that it shows the condition of a teenager after receiving the Covid-19 vaccination, specifically mentioning convulsion and severe dyspnoea.
The video was also shared on Facebook an: 4. A reverse Google image search revealed that the footage was originally published on YouTube on March 21, 2015, several years before the Covid-19 pandemic began. Additionally, a Russian-language article from March 20, 2015, reported that the video shows a girl in the Kazakh city of Zhanaozen who was admitted to a hospital after being vaccinated against measles. The health authorities in the article did not attribute her condition to the vaccine.
